content: on needle pull yarn through pick up and knit 12 sts along the right side of the heel 4 insert dn into 1st st on rear needle purlwise letting st flap then knit 6 sts from heel turn fall off needle then insert dn into next st on rear the beginning-of-round now occurs at this point in the needle knitwise leaving st on needle pull yarn through middle of the bottom of the heel pm or note this as repeat steps 3 and 4 until all sts are grafted together beginning of round bor in some manner weave in all ends decreasing round 1 k to 3 sts before lsp k2tog k1 work 20 sts across instep to rsp k1 ssk k to end of round 2 sts decreased decreasing round 2 k to end of round abbreviations k knit repeat decreasing rounds 1 and 2 seven more times p purl 40 sts remain k2tog knit 2 together foot and toe ssk slip 2 sts knitwise move both to left needle and k 2 together through continue in plain stockinette k every stitch until the back of loop sock measures 2 ¾ /7cm shorter than the total desired p2tog purl 2 together length stopping at the lsp this is now the new bor sl1 slip_stitch co cast on if you can try the sock on the intended foot to check fit rs right side and length ws wrong side work 3 rounds of cc 1 round of mc and 1 round of cc st s stitch es break mc and continue with cc until the end of the bor beginning of round sock dn darning needle mc main colour decreasing round a k1 ssk k to 3 sts before rsp cc contrast colour k2tog k1 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before rsp k2tog k1 4 sts decreased decreasing round b k repeat decreasing rounds a and b four more times 20 sts decreased total 20 sts remain © 2023 galt house of yarn all rights reserved v1 1 www galthouseofyarn ca
